Content: There should be arsenals/weapons storage facilities, that permit the
storage of weapons for unit templates, to enable the activation of this
''reserve'' unit from the civilian population. So this are essentially
the armories of militias that are only used in times of need (z.b. war

or rebellion in the neighbouring colony).
The arsenals should
store specific unti templates instead of random ones (as the local
ground-police-force/milita does). This permits a specific tempalte for
a desert-border-world in opposition to a densly inhabited world.
